#4.1
Fast Track
Select the skill(s) you want to learn.  This lesson will include ONLY the skills that you select.  

You want to be able to:
     about the Debugger
     starting the Debugger
     Debugger main view
     setting breakpoints
     The Trap Manager
     setting complex traps and watchpoints
     starting the process
     examining data
     getting call stack information
     pop up Expression Evaluator
     Variable Browser 
     Structure Browser
     Examining Arrays
     The Array Browser
     multiprocess debugging
     for more information



Are you finished selecting?
